title: Which unique pick would you like to see next this season?
body:
In the past couple months(roughly) there has been a boom in overall champion and play-style diversity(nice) and It seems like more an more unique picks will be making their way into the pro scene.

I'm ecstatic because I'm all about unorthodox picks, and seeing nautilus support become meta puts a big smile on my face because I've personally used it many times with success before it's debut.

I'd like to share the champ/role pick I'd like to see next int he lcs, and wonder what unique picks other people would like to see next.

My choice is not even close to neglected, but the role I want this champ in is definitely unorthodox but I basically main it and if they are picking Irelia support in lcs, this champ definitely deserves a chance:

**My choice as support, is non other than the Prince of Demacia himself, J 2 tha mother lovin 4.**

-%health damage passive+armor shredding dragon lance for busting the tanky meta.
-the aoe slow+shield that scales with multiple enemies perfect for 2v2 laning.
-the vision obtaining, attack speed boosting, gap closing demacian standard.
-the "I'm J4 I'm helping" 2nd gap closing, zoning, lockdown ultimate that makes or breaks games.

He has surprisingly good poke with just his lance and can quickly roam the map and assist other lanes with the ability to jump walls, as well as bringing tons of damage with minimal and mostly tank items.

He's a beast in general, but secret op support, would love to see it in lcs.

Would you agree? What would you like to see?

replies.body: I wanna see machine gun lulu or lulu jungle. lulu is already a flex, why not play her in one of the two roles you don't normally see her in.
an anti mobility mage, that has a targeted slow that removes the ability to use dashes/blinks for 5 seconds.
I want to see Mundo go where he pleases.

J4 Support in LPL. Was a thing.
Naut Support was done in Season 3/4
Naut came back because of "diversity" of the new meta (welcome back tanks).
Cinderhulk is just too damn good.

If I had a choice, it'd be BRING BACK ZILEAN! (I'm loving lobbing bombs and that stun is fun)
I'm pretty sure this has already happened in China or Korea, however I don't have the time to look up the game. Other regions have a much larger champion variety, such as mata's support kennen.
